column4: also if it's encrypted and you have problems it's fairly difficult to get it all set back up...
I do have an encrypted "partition" on a file on my USB key using truecrypt..
gpus anyone? I need a a good one for a big screen... my geforce 8500 drivers are garbage for tv out..
why don't you just get a separate TV out adapter if that's the only thing that doesn't work right?
